item.title: Holiday Chit Chat with Kate Flannery
item.description: This Friday on Office Ladies 6.0, we have a special holiday bonus episode with Kate Flannery! Jenna, Angela and Kate talk about holiday decorating, Office holiday memories including which Office holiday party they would’ve attended if given a choice, and the ladies talk more about Meredith’s bald head. We also hear from Kendra Adachi of “The Lazy Genius” about her tradition when wrapping gifts... Feed: https://feeds.megaphone.fm/office-ladies

item.title: Hanukkah on Rye
item.description: This week, we review a Hallmark Hanukkah special, Hanukkah on Rye. It's the story of Hallmark wanting to make more money. Feed: https://audioboom.com/channels/4829841.rss
